body: One of your kingdom's citizens creates an artistic masterpiece, constructs a particularly impressive building, or otherwise brings glory to your kingdom. Fame increases by 1, your Treasury increases by 1d6 BP, and Unrest decreases by 2. You gain a +4 bonus on Economy checks until the next Event phase.
name: Outstanding Success
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Turn Sequence/Events/Outstanding Success
